description: When trying to run multiple api workers with a proxy in front, code such as describe regions fails because it returns the internal listening port instead of the port of the proxy.
title: multiple api workers breaks because ec2_port is used for both internal and external port

comments.content: When trying to run multiple api workers with a proxy in front, code such as describe regions fails because it returns the internal listening port instead of the port of the proxy.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
